page.title: 20Our Survey of Tavistock
page.content: We thought the Domesday project was very interesting.We found out lots of things by going out on{field trips,} looking in books,{interviewing people, looking at places and reading maps. There are about 150 children in the school aged between 7 and 11, and all 6 classes took part. { Each class wrote 3 pages and studied { a 2 kilometre area}for land cover and amenities. Our class, Pewtor Jones 4th year, was divided into groups of about 6, to study Whitchurch, Sport and Future plans. By finding out about Tavistock we have learnt all about its{history}and origins.We have also found out about { Tavistock Today}by taking photographs,etc. We think this information will be useful to future generations who will read the 1986 Domesday Project.
